name: Varun Shankar
content: Varun Shankar: Kahlert School of Computing, University of Utah Varun Shankar Assistant Professor Associate Director, Master of Software Development program Kahlert School of Computing University of Utah Home Google Scholar CV Teaching WEB 2891 Kahlert School of Computing University of Utah Salt Lake City, UT 84112 shankar AT cs dot utah dot edu As of July 1, 2023, I am an Assistant Professor (tenure-track) in the Kahlert School of Computing (KSoC) at the University of Utah. My primary research focus is on the development of efficient, scalable, and provably-accurate machine learning models for scientific applications. This research lies at the intersection of scientific machine learning, scientific computing, and high performance computing. I am not currently recruiting PhD students. From July 2018 to June 2023, I was an Assistant Professor Lecturer (non tenure-track) in KSoC. My primary responsibilities involved teaching, TA coordination, and devloping curriculum materials for the Master of Software Development (MSD) program within KSoC. I currently serve as Associate Director of the MSD program.Â I have co-advised MS and PhD students in KSoC and Math for many years. I obtained my PhD in Computing (with a focus on Scientific Computing) from KSoC and also did a 4 year postdoc in the Math Biology group in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Utah.
